nodes.text: This Personal Luxury Yacht 3000 was purchased by Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi, disguised as Rako Hardeen, from a Bith starship dealer on Nal Hutta around 21 BBY during the time of the Clone Wars. The yacht was purchased as part of an undercover mission to uncover a kidnapping plot spearheaded by the bounty hunter Moralo Eval.
